briefdescription.para: Disable designware spi device.

inbodydescription.para: disable spi operations, then program spi control regs is possible

briefdescription.para: Enable designware spi device.
Clear all designware spi interrupt.
Test whether spi is busy, busy return 1, else 0.
Test whether spi is ready to send, 1 ready, 0 not ready.
Test whether spi is read to receive, 1 ready, 0 not ready.
Write data to spi send fifo.
Read data from spi receive fifo, return data received.
Get receive FIFO level.
Send data through designware spi when available, mostly used in interrupt method, non-blocked function.

parameterdescription.para: Device object is not ready to send data

briefdescription.para: Receive one char through designware spi, mostly used in interrupt routine, non-blocked function.
Send char through designware spi spi in poll method, blocked function.

inbodydescription.para: wait until spi is ready to send

briefdescription.para: Receive one char through designware spi in poll method, blocked function.

inbodydescription.para: wait until spi is ready to receive

briefdescription.para: Reset designware FIFO by disable spi device, then enable device.
Enable designware spi bit interrupt with mask.
Disable designware spi bit interrupt with mask.
Set designware spi device frequency.

detaileddescription.para: Set designware spi device data frame size
Choose proper designware spi clock mode setting value
Select a spi slave with slv_line

Get TX FIFO Length. calculate spi fifo length using fifo threshold method If you attempt to set bits [7:0] of this register to a value greater than or equal to the depth of the FIFO, this field is not written and retains its current value.

briefdescription.para: Disable designware spi send or receive interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: Informations about spi open state, working state, frequency, spi registers, working method, interrupt number

briefdescription.para: Enable DesignWare SPI send or receive interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: Informations about spi open state, working state, frequency, spi registers, working method, interrupt number

briefdescription.para: Enable designware spi interrupt.
Disable designware spi interrupt.

inbodydescription.para: disable spi send&receive interrupt after disable spi interrupt

briefdescription.para: Static or inline functions, variables for DesignWare SPI handle SPI operations, only used in this file.
